overview: Beautiful lesbian Samantha Ryan is the prime suspect in the murder of her lesbian lover. But Samantha isn't talking, so detective Melissa Monet takes a different approach to her interrogation - and demands that the young blonde "cooperate" sexually. Meanwhile, prosecutor Chloe is on the case, and she needs to put someone behind bars. When young rookie Dana Dearmond asks too many questions, Chloe needs to distract the young brunette - namely, by an office tryst on the hot lesbian redhead's desk. Across town, hot shot defense attorney Dia Zerva is having an office affair of her own - with gorgeous assistant Elexis Monroe. Deauxma also stars as a hot lesbian cop in this tale of mystery, murder and lesbian sex.
title: Lesbian Office Seductions 2: Law & Order
